{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=Nighthawk M1 |revision=(MR1100) |price=276 |fcc_date=09/07/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability=now |type=mobile router, LTE router |fcc_id=PY317200378 |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=MDM9250 |fla1=512 |fla1_brand=ESMT |fla1_model=FM6BD4G4GXA-1.8BLE |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=FM6BD4G4GXA-1.8BLE |expansion_if_types=USB 3.1 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag=yes |serial=yes |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA6174A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9377 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |wi2_txchains=1 |wi2_rxchains=1 |wi2_sstreams=1 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |flags=LTE modem, MicroSD Card slot |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }} {{TagLine|Nighthawk M1 - 4Gx Gigabit LTE Mobile Router}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.netgear.com.au/landings/nighthawk-mr1100-mobile-router/}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Netgear|model=MR1100}}
Currently available for Telstraâ€™s 4GX LTE network in Australia and soon :to be available for AT&T in the US according to FCC documents.
===Specifications (MR1100-1TLAUS for Telstra)=== * Max 1Gbps download speeds & 150Mbps upload speeds * LTE CAT 16, LTE Advanced 4-band CA, 4x4 MIMO * Up to 4x Carrier Aggregation * LTE/4G: 700/900/1800/2100/2600 MHz * 3G: 850/900/1900/2100 MHz * Battery: 5040mAh for up to 24 hours of use * Dimensions: 105.5 (L) x 105.5 (W) x 20.35 (H) mm * Weight: 240g (with battery)
===Specifications=== <!-- *[https://4pda.ru/forum/index.php?showtopic=778715&view=findpost&p=60717769 ''Netgear MR1100'' on '''4pda''' forums] --> :- [[Qualcomm]] MDM9250 - Snapdragon X16 LTE Modem ([https://www.qualcomm.com/products/snapdragon/modems/4g-lte/x16 MDM9250]) :- [[Qualcomm]] WTR5975 - Gigabit LTE (Category 16) RF transceiver, : (single-chip RF companion to Qualcomm Snapdragon X16 LTE modem) :- ''Qorvo'' QM58101 - MMPA (Multimode Multi-band Power Amplifier) :- ''ESMT'' (''Elite Semi'') FM6BD4G4GXA-1.8BLE (Flash/RAM, BGA162) : 4Gb NAND Flash (512Mb x8) + 4Gb mobile DDRII SDRAM (128Mb x32) :- [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA6174A - 2T2R 802.11abgn/ac (MU-MIMO) :- [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9377 - 1T1R 802.11abgn/ac (MU-MIMO) :- [[Qualcomm]] PMD9655 - Power Management Integrated Circuit (PMIC) :- [[Qualcomm]] SMB1356 - Qualcomm Quick Charge 2.0 Controller :- [[Realtek]] RTS5411 - USB 3.1 Gen1 4x Port Hub (USB Type C) :- ''Genesys Logic'' GL3224 - USB 3.1 Gen1 Dual/Single LUN Controller
===Reviews=== *[https://www.whistleout.com.au/Broadband/Reviews/netgear-nighthawk-m1-review ''Netgear Nighthawk M1 Review'' on '''WhistleOut'''] *[https://www.4gltemall.com/blog/netgear-nighthawk-m1-gigabit-lte-router-test/ ''NETGEAR Nighthawk M1 Test'' on '''4G LTE Mall'''] *[https://www.4gltemall.com/blog/tag/netgear-nighthawk-m1-specs/ ''NETGEAR Nighthawk M1 Specs'' on '''4G LTE Mall''']
===News=== *[https://www.qualcomm.com/news/releases/2016/10/17/qualcomm-telstra-ericsson-and-netgear-announce-worlds-first-gigabit-class Press Release on '''Qualcomm'''] *[https://www.telstra.com.au/broadband/mobile-broadband/nighthawk-m1 ''NETGEAR Nighthawk M1'' on '''Telstra'''] *[http://www.anandtech.com/show/11097/netgear-nighthawk-m1-lte-cat-16-router-1-gbps-carrier-aggregation ''Netgear Nighthawk M1: LTE Cat 16 Router up to 1 Gbps'' on '''AnandTech'''] *[http://www.anandtech.com/show/11191/netgear-nighthawk-m1-shows-up-at-mwc-coming-to-europe-in-mid2017-but-there-is-a-catch ''MWC 2017: Netgear Nighthawk M1 Coming to Europe in Mid-2017, But'' on '''AnandTech'''] *[https://www.pcper.com/reviews/Mobile/Gigabit-LTE-Path-5G-Qualcomm-Ericsson-Netgear-and-Telstra/Netgear-Nighthawk-M1-Mobile ''Gigabit LTE: The Path to 5G with Qualcomm, Ericsson, Netgear and Telstra'' on '''PC|Per'''] *[https://www.4gltemall.com/blog/netgear-nighthawk-m2-vs-m1/ ''NETGEAR Nighthawk M2 VS M1'' on '''4G LTE Blog''']
